userPrompt: I want to research the adoption rate of the more modern AI tooling that exists that are considered the game changing ways of using an AI agent. agents.md, skills.md, MCP servers. Is it really on a huge climb or is it still really slow? Include future projections.
researchPlan:
TOPIC: Adoption Rate of Modern AI Developer Tooling — Hype vs Reality
TIME AXIS: Technology Eras (Pre-Copilot, Copilot Era, Chat-Augmented, Agentic Explosion)
CATEGORIES: AI Coding Assistants, Agentic Coding, MCP Servers, Agent Instruction Files, Skills & Workflows
CORE METRICS: User growth, revenue, developer survey adoption, GitHub stars, enterprise adoption, sentiment/trust, productivity impact, market projections
HYPE VS REALITY: Scorecard with gap analysis
PROPOSED SECTIONS: Overview, Growth Timelines, Reality Check, Tool Deep Dive, Enterprise vs Individual, Future Projections, Sources

contentAnalysis.readabilityNote: Data-driven analysis with hype-vs-reality framework and multi-dimensional adoption metrics
